title: Uni students demand an increase in Mahapola
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Students and staff of the Medical Faculty of the University College of Kuliyapitiya protested on Tuesday (19) citing several demands.
Students & the staff demanded authorities increase the Mahapola Scholarship, and issues surrounding the price hike on paper.
Three-wheeler fares to increase; Drivers to stop using meter, & negotiate fare with customer
IMF lauds India’s assistance to Sri Lanka during Economic Crisis
‘Present economical, political & social catastrophe was man made’ – Sajith
